extendedInfo.description: This key unlocks the RoadSync 2.5 Main App (Demo.) RoadSync uses Microsoft Exchange ActiveSync to provide secure, wireless & direct PUSH synchronization of e-mail, calendar, contacts, tasks & attachments. Please first install the 14-day trial before purchasing.ON SALE NOW!(Reg: $19.99)Limited-time offer.

reviews.title: Great exchange app with minor improvements req.
reviews.comment: First used on Nokia N95, still a great app 4 connecting to xchg with minor ui improvement would make it awesome, love having seperate client for work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Demo Version works, paid for version keeps failing
reviews.comment: I had tried the demo version, which works well. I have upgraded to the paid for version which keeps crashing. Please sort out the bugs that are impacting on my Asus Transformer Prime  Thank you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bought it but don\'t really need it in android 3.x
reviews.comment: I bought this when I had my own Exchange server, I have now moved to Office 365 and couldn\'t get RoadSync to work.  Three emails and over two weeks of waiting I still haven\'t had a response from their support. I know have mail, calendar and contacts in native google syncing with Office 365. I finally got Roadsync to work after a lot of messing around but I don\'t think I will use it.  Their attitude towards support means they don\'t deserve your money, in my opinion.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I am so happy I found this app. This is the only app which could connect to my company exchange server, it receives mails even before my outlook does.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OFFICE365 Allows Contact Update
reviews.comment: Roadsync stops the duplicate contact problem and works flawlessly with Office365. Touchdown is OK but contacts do not update to the server or Outlook. Like the interface. Looks like Outlook Mobile. Well designed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mature, Professional. A couple of features lacking.
reviews.comment: This is the best and most stable email client app for mobiles. Great for serious users as well as casual ones. I used to use this on my old Nokia E-63 and bought it for my Android as well. Mature. Supports downloading attachments of all formats, etc.. What else just has to be there: 1. Widgets for calendar and tasks. 2. Download of attachments, once started, must continue till specifically stopped by user. A \"Downloads\" module should allow user to view and manage the various on-going downloads centrally.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only this application allow me to edit email before forwarding without loosing html format. Big thanks for the developer. You are very smart :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung tab P7500
reviews.comment: I purchased this product.  .Mails are downloded but unable to view or download or save pdf, .xls and. Xlss files. What is the solution.? Please support or upgrade as required.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Was the best when no MS exchange app existed.. now is a sorry excuse for an app- no updates and worse than native froyo! T-mo G2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was ahead, now behind the curve
reviews.comment: I relied upon this app extensively on my Droid Incredible, especially for its ability to handle synchronization of Exchange tasks.  Annoyingly, however, it does not retain data in a manner which is conducive to using Nandroids to backup the system, and every time I flashed a new ROM, I\'d have to completely rebuild the database.  Support was completely unsympathetic to the situation.  Now Sense 3.5 has a better Exchange interface (including tasks) than Datatviz appears to be able to cook up, and having removed the application, I went to install it on my tablet only to learn that I can only run the trial version (even though I\'ve PAID for the full version).  This is a throwback to the byzantine era of copy protection.   Dataviz oughta know better.  3 stars for a good app for the unadventurous.  Power users should look elsewhere.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good apps works well with Samsung Galaxy Note 2,Asus Infinity
reviews.comment: Good apps ,works well for Exchange 2003 Even have ability to move inbox to Archive folder and sync to Exchange I have installed it on several android devices with same performance  : Acer Iconia Honeycomb, Galaxy Note II, Asus Infinity, and the last Asus Fonepad Jelly Bean 4.1.2, no problem Solid works even no last update since 2011 except calendar,task and note  Cons \302\246  good only for email client . Combine apps with \"Tasks and Notes\" from Jacob Klos will make perfect tools for exchange user road warrior.
reviews.author: Zephyr White

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t keep sync\'d properly to Outlook :-(. Modern widgets would be really nice too. Looks like cupcake
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good App -Need updates
reviews.comment: its a Good App for Exchange sync and works well with ICS  Datawiz need to upgrade product inline with present scenario.Some issue like unable to see attachments,inserted jpegs etc.  Different  theme option must be there.Presenlty There is no option. These light modidfications helps this app to become No1 email app for exchange active sync with less expencive in google play
reviews.author: Subin Namadevan

reviews.comment: Recent update made this app run very slowly. Unresponsive. Missed key presses. Nearly unusable. LG Optima V. Much slower than last release.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: App won\'t allow me to proceed past registration as it keeps reporting \"No Wireless Connection\". So how did I download it then?   Complete waste of time and money.
reviews.author: LeicaLout LeicaLout

reviews.title: Database not found. Email sync has been disabled
reviews.comment: I have been using RoadSync for a couple of years with no problems. This morning, all of a sudden, stopped working, does not show any email in the in box, even the new ones, and get the following error message:\"Database not found. Email sync has been disabled\".  It I try to send an email I get this error:\"Failed to create new message\".  Exchange server is working as I can check mail from any PC with any email client. IT did not make any changes to the exchange server. Roadsync has all the usernames, password, configurations for the server correct.   Any clue? Thanks for helping. Pietro  Motorola Milestone UK , Android 2.2 RoadSync2.5030 (612)
reviews.author: Pietro Ghezzi

reviews.comment: Had Rowland on my g1. Just purchased sell streak and can\'t get it to download. Purchased the full version. Won\'t work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: App hangs up EVERY time I open an email or delete an email. Have to wait 30 sec before a force close msg shows Don\'t buy for samsung galaxy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cumbersome interface, no updates past 6+ months, does not work with zimbra, causing the phone to freeze. Uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pass on this
reviews.comment: Buggy handling large inboxes. No Oof management. Update pace is glacial, no new features in ~1 year.  Poor integration with contacts
reviews.author: A Google User
